languages.text: The psyker deals {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Psychic Shriek{/g} damage to everyone within a 7-cell cone in front of the psyker and forces them to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. All targets that fail the test are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} until the psyker's next turn.
languages.original_text: Наносит урон {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Пси-визгом{/g} всем существам в конусе (7 клеток) перед псайкером и заставляет цели выполнять проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g} до следующего хода псайкера.

traits.locale_text: The psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g} damage to everyone within a 7-cell radius cone in front of the psyker and forces them to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. All targets that fail the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} until the psyker's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

The psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g} damage to everyone within a 7-cell cone in front of the psyker and forces them to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. All targets that fail the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} until the psyker's next turn.

The psyker deals {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psychic Shriek{/g} damage to everyone within a 7-cell cone in front of the psyker and forces them to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. All targets that fail the {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} until the psyker's next turn.

languages.text: Наносит урон {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Пси-визгом{/g} всем существам в конусе (7 клеток) перед псайкером и заставляет цели выполнять проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала цель оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушена{/g} до следующего хода псайкера.
languages.original_text: The psyker deals {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Psychic Shriek{/g} damage to everyone within a 7-cell cone in front of the psyker and forces them to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. All targets that fail the test are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} until the psyker's next turn.

languages.text: 灵能者对前方7格扇形范围内所有目标造成伤害，伤害等同于{g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}灵能狂啸{/g}造成的伤害，所有受影响的目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性检定。未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}检定{/g}的目标会被{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}，直到灵能者的下个回合开始为止。
languages.original_text: The psyker deals {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Psychic Shriek{/g} damage to everyone within a 7-cell cone in front of the psyker and forces them to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. All targets that fail the test are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} until the psyker's next turn.

traits.locale_text: 灵能者对前方7格扇形范围内所有目标造成伤害，伤害等同于{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}灵能狂啸{/g}造成的伤害，所有受影响的目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}的目标会被{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}，直到灵能者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。

灵能者对前方7格扇形范围内所有目标造成伤害，伤害等同于{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}灵能狂啸{/g}造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，所有受影响的目标都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。未能通过{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}的目标会被{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}，直到灵能者的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。

languages.text: 異能者の前方半径7セル以内にいる全員に{g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}異能の声{/g}ダメージを与え、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わせる。判定に合格できなかったターゲットはすべて、異能者の次のターンまで{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: The psyker deals {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Psychic Shriek{/g} damage to everyone within a 7-cell cone in front of the psyker and forces them to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. All targets that fail the test are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} until the psyker's next turn.

traits.locale_text: 異能者の前方半径7セルの扇状範囲内にいる全員に{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}サイキックの悲鳴{/g}ダメージを付与し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わせる。{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格できなかったターゲットはすべて、異能者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}状態になる。

異能者の前方半径7セル以内にいる全員に{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}サイキックの悲鳴{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与え、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わせる。{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に合格できなかったターゲットはすべて、異能者の次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}になる。

languages.text: El psíquico inflige el daño de {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Grito psíquico{/g} a todos los que estén en un cono de 7 casillas delante del psíquico y les obliga a realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. Todos los objetivos que fallen esta prueba quedan {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidos{/g} hasta el próximo turno del psíquico.
languages.original_text: The psyker deals {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Psychic Shriek{/g} damage to everyone within a 7-cell cone in front of the psyker and forces them to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. All targets that fail the test are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} until the psyker's next turn.

traits.locale_text: El psíquico inflige el daño de {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Grito psíquico{/g} a todos los que estén en un cono de 7 casillas de radio delante del psíquico y les obliga a realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. Todos los objetivos que fallen esta {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} quedan {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidos{/g} hasta el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del psíquico.

languages.text: Der Psioniker fügt allen Zielen innerhalb eines Kegels von 7 Feldern vor dem Psioniker Schaden durch {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Psionischer Schrei{/g} zu und zwingt sie zu einer {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}. Alle Ziele, die diese Probe nicht bestehen, werden bis zum nächsten Zug des Psionikers {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}.
languages.original_text: The psyker deals {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Psychic Shriek{/g} damage to everyone within a 7-cell cone in front of the psyker and forces them to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. All targets that fail the test are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} until the psyker's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Fügt allen Zielen innerhalb eines Kegels mit dem Radius von 7 Feldern vor dem Psioniker {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Psionischer Schrei{/g}-Schaden zu und zwingt sie zu einer {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g}. Alle Ziele, die diese {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} nicht bestehen, werden {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g}, und zwar bis zum nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} des Psionikers.

languages.text: Le psyker inflige des dégâts de {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Cri psychique{/g} à tous ceux qui se trouvent dans un cône de 7 cases de rayon devant lui, et les oblige à passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}. Toutes les cibles qui échouent à ce test sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} jusqu'au tour suivant du psyker.
languages.original_text: The psyker deals {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Psychic Shriek{/g} damage to everyone within a 7-cell cone in front of the psyker and forces them to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. All targets that fail the test are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} until the psyker's next turn.

traits.locale_text: Le psyker inflige des dégâts de {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicShriek}Cri psychique{/g} à tous ceux qui se trouvent dans un cône de 7 cases de rayon devant lui, et les oblige à passer un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g}. Toutes les cibles qui échouent à ce {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdies{/g} jusqu'au tour suivant du psyker.

languages.text: Ruhsezerin önündeki 7 hücrelik bir koni içinde bulunan herkes, {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Ruhsezi Çığlığı{/g} hasarı alır kalır ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girmek zorunda kalır. Bu testi geçemeyen tüm hedefler, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemler{/g} ve ruhsezerin bir sonraki turuna dek öyle kalır.
languages.original_text: The psyker deals {g|f:fa305ba4e2aa48f394608d1ccfc6d385}Psychic Shriek{/g} damage to everyone within a 7-cell cone in front of the psyker and forces them to make a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. All targets that fail the test are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} until the psyker's next turn.
